text: samudra tiratt sthiticeytirunna a pattanattepparri ni ivareateannu ceadiccuneakku. sabatt dinacaranattil avar atikramam kanicca karyam. sabatt dinattil avarkkavasyamaya matsyannal jalapparappil avaruteyatutt kuttamayi vannatum sabatt acarikkentatta dinannalil ava avarute atutt varatirunnatumaya karyam. avar adharmam pravartticcirunnatinal nam avare avvidham pariksikkukayayirunnu
